title: War!
subTitle: The Hun Invasion
description: When the Ostrogoths try to expand their territory into regions controlled by the Huns, the Huns respond by exploding into Eastern Europe. Most of the Teutonic tribes are enslaved, forced to give up land, or flee to Rome for sanctuary.

title: Vassalage
subTitle: Visgoths
description: The Visgoths are granted land in Rome as they flee the Huns. However, they soon become unhappy with the arrangments...

title: Coalition
subTitle: The Suevi & Vandals
description: Pursued by the Huns, the Marco-manni, Quadi, & Siling and Asing Vandals join forces before fleeing to Rome

title: Vassalage
subTitle: The Suevi & Vandals
description: Unable to stop the onslaught of the Huns, the Suvei & Vandal coalition appeal to Rome for sanctuary.

title: Battle of Adrianople
description: The combined Visgoth and remnant Ostrogoth cavalries crush the Roman legions, marking the end of Rome's military dominance in Europe

title: Resurgance!
subTitle: British
description: The British peoples regain their political identity as Rome begins to pull out of Brittania.

title: Independence!
subTitle: Kingdom of Iberia
description: To ease conflicts with Persia in order to respond to events in the North; Rome agrees to give the Kingdom of Iberia its independence.

title: Independence!
subTitle: Kingdom of Armenia
description: To ease conflicts with Persia in order to respond to events in the North; Rome agrees to give the Kingdom of Armenia its independence.

title: War!
subTitle: Slavic Expansion
description: As the Huns overrun the Teutonic world, the Slavs edge westward, taking advantage of the chaos
